username.label: Username
username.description: Unique identifier for the user account
username.explainer: Your unique login name used to identify you in the system. This should be between 3-20 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and underscores. The username cannot be changed after account creation.

email.label: Email Address
email.explainer: Primary email address for account notifications and password recovery. Must be a valid email format and will be verified during registration.

language.label: Language
language.explainer: Preferred language for the user interface and system notifications. This setting affects date formats, number formats, and text direction.

roles.label: User Roles
roles.explainer: Defines the permissions and access levels for this user. Multiple roles can be assigned to provide granular access control.

advancedEnabled.label: Enable Advanced Settings
advancedEnabled.explainer: Enable additional configuration options for power users. These settings affect system behavior and should be modified with caution.

sessionTimeout.label: Session Timeout (minutes)
sessionTimeout.explainer: Automatically log out users after this period of inactivity. Recommended range is 15-60 minutes for security.

apiRateLimit.label: API Rate Limit
apiRateLimit.explainer: Controls the maximum number of API requests per hour. Higher limits are available for premium accounts.

emailNotifications.label: Email Notifications
emailNotifications.explainer: Receive important updates and alerts via email.

pushNotifications.label: Push Notifications
pushNotifications.explainer: Receive real-time notifications in your browser.

frequency.label: Notification Frequency
frequency.explainer: How often you want to receive notification summaries.

productName.label: Product Name
productName.explainer: The display name for your product as it appears to customers.

description.label: Product Description
description.explainer: A brief description of your product's features and benefits.

category.label: Product Category
category.explainer: Primary category for product classification and search filtering.

basePrice.label: Base Price ($)
basePrice.explainer: The standard retail price for this product before any discounts.

discountEnabled.label: Enable Discounts
discountEnabled.explainer: Allow promotional discounts and special pricing for this product.

currency.label: Currency
currency.explainer: The currency used for pricing this product.
